name: stick
effect: Held by Farfetch’d: Raises the holder’s critical hit counter by 2.
short_effect: Raises Farfetch’d’s critical hit ratio by two stages.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: An item to be held by FARFETCH’D. It is a very long and stiff stalk of leek that boosts the critical-hit ratio.
flavor_text.platinum: An item to be held by FARFETCH’D. It is a very long and stiff stalk of leek that boosts the critical-hit ratio.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: An item to be held by FARFETCH’D. It is a very long and stiff stalk of leek that boosts the critical-hit ratio.
